dm

Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • dm.Battle

  • public class Battle
extends java.lang.Object
    The Battle class represents a battle scenario involving multiple monsters. It manages various aspects of the battle such as actions, health points, critical hit rates, and more.

    This class provides methods to add hits, get the current monster, and initialize hit values.
